sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, TB.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT muser.REG_ID ,mlog.LOG_IDX ,mlog.LOG_TYPE ,mlog.MAC_ADDRESS ,mlog.REMARKS ,TO_CHAR(mlog.REG_DATE , 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24-MM-SS') AS REG_DATE ,muser.BIZPLC_IDX ,muser.USER_NAME ,bizplc.FST_BIZPLC_NAME ,bizplc.SCD_BIZPLC_NAME ,bizplc.FST_BIZPLC_CODE ,bizplc.SCD_BIZPLC_CODE FROM m_log_t mlog INNER JOIN (SELECT MAX(LOG_IDX) LOG_IDX FROM M_LOG_T GROUP BY reg_id ) AA ON mlog.LOG_IDX = AA.LOG_IDX INNER JOIN m_user_t muser ON mlog.REG_ID = muser.REG_ID INNER JOIN m_bizplc_t bizplc ON muser.BIZPLC_IDX = bizplc.BIZPLC_IDX WHERE 1=1
muser.REG_ID LIKE '%' ||#reg_id#|| '%'
muser.USER_NAME LIKE '%' ||#user_name#|| '%'
FST_BIZPLC_CODE = #fst_bizplc_cd#
SCD_BIZPLC_CODE= #scd_bizplc_cd#
LOG_TYPE= #log_type#
mlog.REG_DATE > to_date(#cont_startdate# ,'yyyymmddhh24miss')
mlog.REG_DATE < to_date(#cont_enddate#, 'yyyymmddhh24miss')
) ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC ) TB ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #firstIndex# + 1 AND #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT muser.REG_ID ,mlog.LOG_IDX ,mlog.LOG_TYPE ,mlog.MAC_ADDRESS ,mlog.REMARKS ,TO_CHAR(mlog.REG_DATE , 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24-MM-SS') AS REG_DATE ,muser.BIZPLC_IDX ,muser.USER_NAME ,bizplc.FST_BIZPLC_NAME ,bizplc.SCD_BIZPLC_NAME ,bizplc.FST_BIZPLC_CODE ,bizplc.SCD_BIZPLC_CODE FROM m_log_t mlog INNER JOIN (SELECT MAX(LOG_IDX) LOG_IDX FROM M_LOG_T GROUP BY reg_id ) AA ON mlog.LOG_IDX = AA.LOG_IDX INNER JOIN m_user_t muser ON mlog.REG_ID = muser.REG_ID INNER JOIN m_bizplc_t bizplc ON muser.BIZPLC_IDX = bizplc.BIZPLC_IDX WHERE 1=1
( muser.REG_ID LIKE '%' ||#searchWrd#|| '%' OR muser.USER_NAME LIKE '%' ||#searchWrd#|| '%' )
FST_BIZPLC_CODE = #fst_bizplc_cd#
SCD_BIZPLC_CODE= #scd_bizplc_cd#
LOG_TYPE= #log_type#
mlog.REG_DATE > to_date(#cont_startdate# ,'yyyymmddhh24miss')
mlog.REG_DATE < to_date(#cont_enddate#, 'yyyymmddhh24miss')
)

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, TB.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT muser.USER_ID ,mlog.LOG_IDX ,mlog.LOG_TYPE ,mlog.MAC_ADDRESS ,mlog.REMARKS ,TO_CHAR(mlog.REG_DATE , 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24-MM-SS') AS REG_DATE ,muser.FST_BIZPLC_CD ,muser.SCD_BIZPLC_CD ,muser.USER_NAME ,bizplc.FST_BIZPLC_CD_NM ,bizplc.SCD_BIZPLC_CD_NM FROM m_log_t mlog INNER JOIN m_user_t muser ON mlog.REG_ID = muser.USER_ID INNER JOIN m_bizplc_t bizplc ON muser.FST_BIZPLC_CD = bizplc.FST_BIZPLC_CD AND muser.SCD_BIZPLC_CD = bizplc.SCD_BIZPLC_CD WHERE 1=1
( muser.USER_ID LIKE '%' ||#searchWrd#|| '%' OR muser.USER_NAME LIKE '%' ||#searchWrd#|| '%' )
muser.FST_BIZPLC_CD = #fst_bizplc_cd#
muser.SCD_BIZPLC_CD= #scd_bizplc_cd#
LOG_TYPE= #log_type#
mlog.REG_DATE > to_date(#cont_startdate# ,'yyyymmddhh24miss')
mlog.REG_DATE < to_date(#cont_enddate#, 'yyyymmddhh24miss')
) ORDER BY LOG_TYPE , FST_BIZPLC_CD , SCD_BIZPLC_CD, USER_ID , REG_DATE DESC ) TB ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #firstIndex# + 1 AND #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT count(*) FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, TB.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT muser.USER_ID ,mlog.LOG_IDX ,mlog.LOG_TYPE ,mlog.MAC_ADDRESS ,mlog.REMARKS ,TO_CHAR(mlog.REG_DATE , 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24-MM-SS') AS REG_DATE ,muser.FST_BIZPLC_CD ,muser.SCD_BIZPLC_CD ,muser.USER_NAME ,bizplc.FST_BIZPLC_CD_NM ,bizplc.SCD_BIZPLC_CD_NM FROM m_log_t mlog INNER JOIN m_user_t muser ON mlog.REG_ID = muser.USER_ID INNER JOIN m_bizplc_t bizplc ON muser.FST_BIZPLC_CD = bizplc.FST_BIZPLC_CD AND muser.SCD_BIZPLC_CD = bizplc.SCD_BIZPLC_CD WHERE 1=1
( muser.USER_ID LIKE '%' ||#searchWrd#|| '%' OR muser.USER_NAME LIKE '%' ||#searchWrd#|| '%' )
muser.FST_BIZPLC_CD = #fst_bizplc_cd#
muser.SCD_BIZPLC_CD= #scd_bizplc_cd#
LOG_TYPE= #log_type#
mlog.REG_DATE > to_date(#cont_startdate# ,'yyyymmddhh24miss')
mlog.REG_DATE < to_date(#cont_enddate#, 'yyyymmddhh24miss')
) ORDER BY LOG_TYPE , FST_BIZPLC_CD , SCD_BIZPLC_CD, USER_ID , REG_DATE DESC ) TB )

SELECT distinct muser.USER_ID , mlog.LOG_IDX , mlog.LOG_TYPE , mlog.MAC_ADDRESS , mlog.REMARKS , TO_CHAR(mlog.REG_DATE , 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24-MM-SS') AS REG_DATE , muser.FST_BIZPLC_CD , muser.SCD_BIZPLC_CD , muser.USER_NAME , bizplc.FST_BIZPLC_CD_NM , bizplc.SCD_BIZPLC_CD_NM FROM m_log_t mlog INNER JOIN m_user_t muser ON mlog.REG_ID = muser.USER_ID INNER JOIN m_bizplc_t bizplc ON muser.FST_BIZPLC_CD = bizplc.FST_BIZPLC_CD AND muser.SCD_BIZPLC_CD = bizplc.SCD_BIZPLC_CD WHERE 1=1 AND LOG_IDX = #log_idx# ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC
